Title: Chiedimi se sono felice
Director: Aldo Baglio, Giacomo Poretti, Giovanni Storti, Massimo Venier
Writer: Massimo Venier (story and screenplay), Aldo Baglio (story and screenplay), Giovanni Storti (story and screenplay), Giacomo Poretti (story and screenplay), Paolo Cananzi (story and screenplay), Walter Fontana (story and screenplay), Graziano Ferrari (screenplay collaboration)
Actors: Aldo Baglio, Giovanni Storti, Giacomo Poretti, Marina Massironi
Plot: James meets John, a close friend of his, with whom he had quarreled three years ago and persuades him to go visit their third friend Aldo, who is dying in Sicily. Through flashbacks we ...
